briefTitle: Setmelanotide for the Treatment of Leptin Receptor (LEPR) Deficiency Obesity
officialTitle: An Open Label, 1-Year Trial, Including a Double-Blind Placebo-Controlled Withdrawal Period, of Setmelanotide (RM-493), a Melanocortin 4 Receptor (MC4R) Agonist, in Leptin Receptor (LEPR) Deficiency Obesity Due to Bi-Allelic Loss-of-Function LEPR Genetic Mutation
summary: To demonstrate statistically significant and clinically meaningful effects of setmelanotide on percent body weight change in participants with LEPR deficiency obesity due to rare bi-allelic or loss-of function mutations at the end of 1 year of treatment.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Reached â‰¥10% Weight Loss Threshold After 1 Year (Pivotal Cohort)
